hooks.command: echo '🧪 TDD Reminder: テストは作成済みですか？ Test -> Code -> Refactor'
echo '🔍 Running tests after Go code change...' && make test && echo '✅ Tests passed!' && make fmt && echo '🎨 Code formatted!' || echo '❌ Tests failed! Please fix before proceeding.'
echo '📝 TDD Workflow: 1️⃣ Test作成 2️⃣ 実装 3️⃣ リファクタ 4️⃣ make test 5️⃣ make fmt 6️⃣ commit'

DATE=$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S'); if [ ! -f MEETING_NOTE.md ]; then echo '# Meeting Notes

## Session ('"$DATE"')

### Objectives
- セッション開始

### Key Discussions
- セッション開始時刻: '"$DATE"'

### Decisions Made
- TBD

### Action Items
- TBD

---
' > MEETING_NOTE.md; else sed -i.bak '1a\
## Session ('"$DATE"')\
### Objectives\n- セッション開始\
### Key Discussions\n- セッション開始時刻: '"$DATE"'\
### Decisions Made\n- TBD\
### Action Items\n- TBD\
---\' MEETING_NOTE.md && rm MEETING_NOTE.md.bak 2>/dev/null; fi; echo '📝 Meeting notes initialized for session: '"$DATE"
